entry.title: Banded Seamless Leggings
entry.summary:
Vendor: deluxe-seamless-leggings
Type: Leggings
Price: 25.00

Up your workout game and get a pair of our Banded Seamless Leggings. With a slim fit, these leggings boast a flattering design thanks to their 4-way stretch construction. The material is stretchy and soft, super comfy. Makes your booty look great!  These are perfect for all activities.

    Details:
    • High waist design
    • The model is 5'4" and wears a size medium and has a 28" waist.
    • Squat proof
    • 4-way breathable stretch fabric
    • Sweat-wicking properties
    • Elastic waistline
    • 79% nylon, 15% polyester, 6% spandex

    Size Guide:

    • True to size
    • High compression
    • If you’re in-between sizes, we recommend sizing up

entry.title: Juicy Seamless Leggings
entry.summary:
Vendor: juicy-seamless-leggings
Type: Leggings
Price: 55.00

Ready to fall in love?

The Juicy Seamless Leggings combine the bold signature sculpting and seamless knit of the original Flex with our famously flattering high-waisted fit. Non-slip, breathable and supportive, they’re engineered to perform.   Get noticed!


Description:
- High-waisted fit
- Model is 5' 4" and is wearing a size Small
- Figure-contouring shades
- Banded glute waistband
- Full leg inseam
- 64% Nylon, 28% Polyester, 8% Spandex
- Product colors: Granite/Ice Blue/Berry

Fit:  Order True to Size.  If in-between size up.

entry.title: Draw-String Leggings
entry.summary:
Vendor: Draw-String-Leggings
Type: Leggings
Price: 45.00

The new KOR Draw-String Leggings are soo comfortable. For a sporty look that flatters and highlights.  Features a high waist and vertical piping lend a sculpting aesthetic while a lace-up front infuses athleticism for a finishing touch. 


Features:
  • High Waisted
  • Secure Ribbed Waistband
  • KOR Logo Branding
  • Sweatproof
  • Seamless Ribbed Knit Fabric
  • Tight Cut Fit
  • Inseam 22-24 Inches
  • Model is 5’4” and wearing size small
  • 90% Nylon 10 Spandex Material



Fit:  Order true to size.

entry.title: Ultra Black Leggings
entry.summary:
Vendor: ultra-black-leggings-new

Price: 60.00

Our 7/8 length Ultra Black Leggings are the perfect length for those who fall in between full length and capris. Our Ultra Black Leggings 7/8 feature a flattering high-waist compression waistband, subtle quad and booty contour lines, and full-length design. We think these are a game-changer! Will you? Limited quantities of these are available.


FEATURES:

* Model is 5'4" and wearing a size S
* Form fitting & squat proof!
* Unique print design that pairs with any accessory.
* Seamless design 
* Super Soft Feel
* 87% Nylon 13% Spandex
* KOR Fitness signature logo on the bottom ankle

entry.title: Max Sculpt Seamless Leggings
entry.summary:
Vendor: max-sculpt-seamless-leggings
Type: Leggings
Price: 40.00 - 59.00 (21 variants)

"Want to get the max out of your training"? Meet your next workout staple: the Max Sculpt Seamless Leggings. 
With a sleek fit that feels like a second skin, these leggings feature advanced sweat-wicking technology to keep you cool and dry during any workout. 
A triple-reinforced, super high waistband works to add extra support while maintaining maximum comfort.
Contour seam lines finish the look, running fluidly down the leg to flatter your physique. 
Pair with the matching Sculpt crop to complete the look!

FEATURES:
* 64% Nylon 28% Polyester 8% Spandex material
* Model is 5'4" and wearing a size Small.
